article_title: Alison Lundergan Grimes holds a slim 4-point advantage over Mitch McConnell in Kentucky
article_text: Democrat Alison Lundergan Grimes holds a slim 4-point advantage over U.S. Senate Minority Leader Mitch McConnell in a new Herald-Leader/WKYT Bluegrass Poll, with many voters saying they disapprove of McConnell but don't yet know Grimes nine months from Election Day.
